alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 18 at 7:54PM EDT until March 22 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, considerable flooding of lowlands occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:05 PM CDT Friday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 18.0 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
